meanings.definition: A person who is overweight or obese.
meanings.sent1: The park was full of fatsos enjoying a picnic on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised the fatsos to eat healthier and exercise regularly.
meanings.sent3: The fatsos at the buffet seemed to be in a competition to see who could eat the most.
meanings.sent4: The fatsos in the waiting room seemed to make the chairs groan under their weight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fatsos waddling around the ice cream truck stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'fatso', used to refer to multiple overweight individuals.
meanings.sent1: The party was filled with fatsos chatting and laughing together.
meanings.sent2: The gym was crowded with fatsos trying to shed some pounds.
meanings.sent3: The fatsos in the movie theater shared a giant tub of popcorn.
meanings.sent4: The street was lined with fast-food restaurants, tempting the fatsos passing by.
meanings.sent5: The fatsos in the group photo stood out due to their size compared to the others.
